snippet.title: Autonauts vs Piratebots - Coming this Summer - WISHLIST NOW
snippet.description:
In Autonauts VS Piratebots you must gather, build and automate to defend an impenetrable base. Assemble and program a Bot army to combat an entire Piratebot invasion. Build, program and battle your way through five different zones…

Wishlist Autonauts vs Piratebots on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1907720/Autonauts_vs_PirateBots/

Wishlist now and sign up to the Autonauts Discord to follow the creation of the game and receive exclusive news and updates!

Join the Autonauts vs Piratebots community: 
🏴‍☠️Autonauts Discord: https://discord.gg/K7YRt8rQPR 
⚙️Autonauts Twitter: https://twitter.com/Automationauts 
🤖Autonauts Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Autonauts/ 

Join the Curve Games community:
🐦 Curve Games Twitter: https://twitter.com/curvegames
🎮 Curve Games Steam Group: https://store.steampowered.com/publis...
📫 Sign up for the official Curve Games newsletter here: https://curvegames.com/sign-up/
